column5: Modern luxury meets new-urban charm in Town Creek, where the brand-new TCTX Urban Lodge awaits just minutes from the historic downtown.  Do you have a larger group? No problem! Parties of 8-14 can be accommodated on a space available basis for additional charge in our detached guest suites. Contact me for details.
column8: the TCTX: lush pool in a hidden courtyard (W room)
